name: Action For Autism (AFA)
description: India’s leading autism NGO offering early intervention, education, training, diagnostics, and adult life support.

name: India Autism Center (IAC)
description: Large residential and learning centre for autistic individuals focused on holistic development.

name: Autism Society of India
description: Advocacy, training, awareness, community support for families across India.

name: ALFAA - Assisted Living for Autistic Adults
description: Residential assisted-living facility offering long-term support for autistic adults.

name: Ummeed Child Development Center
description: One of India’s top developmental disability centres providing therapy, early intervention, and family training.

name: Darpan Autism Centre
description: Holistic development centre for autistic individuals with therapy & training programs.

name: Vatsalyam Centre
description: Provides structured teaching, behaviour support, and independence-building programs.

name: Approach Autism Society
description: Parent-led autism support NGO focusing on awareness, training, and early intervention.

name: Communication DEALL
description: Developmental program for autistic children focusing on communication and motor skills.

name: Autisme Genève
description: Leading Geneva-based autism association offering family support, advocacy, and community programs.

name: Fondation Pôle Autisme
description: Foundation offering specialised autism services, training, research, and community support.

name: A-Cube (Association of Autistic Adults)
description: Community group for autistic adults without intellectual disabilities.

name: Forum for Autism
description: Parent-led support group offering local meetups, guidance, and community.

name: Autism Parents Forum India
description: India-wide parent community offering webinars and support.

name: Autisme Genève – Cafés Rencontres
description: In-person parent & peer support meetups in Geneva.

name: RPwD Act 2016
description: Main disability rights law in India ensuring entitlements for autistic individuals.

name: National Trust Schemes
description: Schemes include Niramaya (insurance), Samarth (respite care), Gharaunda (group homes), Disha (early intervention).

name: Disability Insurance (IV/AI)
description: Federal disability insurance offering rehabilitation, financial support, and integration measures.

name: Social Worker’s Toolbox
description: Library of printable visual schedules for routines.

name: NoodleNook Visual Supports
description: Free printables for autism: visual rules, schedules, communication cards.

name: A Day In Our Shoes – Visual Schedules
description: 44 printable routine charts for home and school.
